Header.title: CODING EPISTEMOLOGY
Header.paragraph: LIFE IS NOT PERFECT. LIFE IS NOT EASY. LIFE IS GOOD. CODING IS LEARNING LIFE, THE MODERN WAY

About.paragraph: Opal Eduventure looks at coding from a completely different philosophical approach. It is not just learning to build software and earn, its about values, about a modern culture, about the new way of life
